### Matplotlib


## Plotly

```{python}
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.io as pio
# The option ('iframe') works for quarto (.qmd) documents
# The option ('notebook' ) works for jupyter Notebook (.ipynb) documents
pio.renderers.default = "iframe" # Ensure Quarto captures output

gapminder = px.data.gapminder()
gapminder2007 = gapminder.query("year == 2007")
fig = px.scatter(gapminder2007, 
                 x="gdpPercap", y="lifeExp", color="continent", 
                 size="pop", size_max=60,
                 hover_name="country")

fig.show()
```
